description.diamond-pearl:
This move enables the
user to attack first.
It fails if the foe is
not readying an
attack, however.

effect.full:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.

This move is not affected by iron fist.
effect.shortEffect: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
